title: Our choice from the recent literature
title_cn: 我们从最近的文献中选择

title: DNA brings quantum dots to order
Nanomechanics of functional and pathological amyloid materials
title_cn: 功能和病理淀粉样蛋白材料的纳米力学

title: Deconfinement leads to changes in the nanoscale plasticity of silicon
title_cn: 脱约束导致硅纳米级可塑性的变化
abstract: Silicon crystals have an important role in the electronics industry, and silicon nanoparticles have applications in areas such as nanoelectromechanical systems, photonics and biotechnology. However, the elastic–plastic transition observed in silicon is not fully understood; in particular, it is not known if the plasticity of silicon is determined by dislocations or by transformations between phases. Here, based on compression experiments and molecular dynamics simulations, we show that the mechanical properties of bulk silicon and silicon nanoparticles are significantly different. We find that bulk silicon exists in a state of relative constraint, with its plasticity dominated by phase transformations, whereas silicon nanoparticles are less constrained and display dislocation-driven plasticity. This transition, which we call deconfinement, can also explain the absence of phase transformations in deformed silicon nanowedges. Furthermore, the phenomenon is in agreement with effects observed in shape-memory alloy nanopillars, and provides insight into the origin of incipient plasticity.
abstract_cn: 硅晶体在电子工业中起着重要作用，而硅纳米颗粒则在纳米机电系统，光子学和生物技术等领域得到应用。但是，尚未完全理解在硅中观察到的弹性和塑性转变。特别地，尚不知道硅的可塑性是由位错还是由相之间的转变决定的。在这里，基于压缩实验和分子动力学模拟，我们表明块状硅和硅纳米颗粒的机械性能存在显着差异。我们发现，大块硅以相对约束的状态存在，其可塑性由相变控制，而硅纳米颗粒的约束较少，并显示出位错驱动的可塑性。这种过渡，我们称为去约束，也可以解释变形硅纳米楔中不存在相变。此外，该现象与在形状记忆合金纳米柱中观察到的效应一致，并提供了对初期可塑性起源的深入了解。

title: DNA-based programming of quantum dot valency, self-assembly and luminescence
title_cn: 基于DNA的量子点价，自组装和发光编程
abstract: The electronic and optical properties of colloidal quantum dots, including the wavelengths of light that they can absorb and emit, depend on the size of the quantum dots. These properties have been exploited in a number of applications including optical detection, solar energy harvesting and biological research. Here, we report the self-assembly of quantum dot complexes using cadmium telluride nanocrystals capped with specific sequences of DNA. Quantum dots with between one and five DNA-based binding sites are synthesized and then used as building blocks to create a variety of rationally designed assemblies, including cross-shaped complexes containing three different types of dots. The structure of the complexes is confirmed with transmission electron microscopy, and photophysical studies are used to quantify energy transfer among the constituent components. Through changes in pH, the conformation of the complexes can also be reversibly switched, turning on and off the transfer of energy between the constituent quantum dots.
abstract_cn: 胶体量子点的电子和光学特性，包括它们可以吸收和发射的光的波长，取决于量子点的大小。这些特性已在许多应用中得到利用，包括光学检测，太阳能收集和生物学研究。在这里，我们报道了使用碲化镉纳米晶体加特定DNA序列的量子点复合物的自组装。合成具有1至5个基于DNA的结合位点的量子点，然后将其用作构建模块以创建各种经过合理设计的组件，包括包含三种不同类型点的十字形复合体。配合物的结构通过透射电子显微镜确认，并且光物理研究被用于量化组成成分之间的能量转移。通过改变pH值，还可以可逆地切换配合物的构象，从而打开和关闭组成量子点之间的能量转移。</ p>

title: Thick lead-free ferroelectric films with high Curie temperatures through nanocomposite-induced strain
title_cn: 通过纳米复合材料诱发的应变，具有高居里温度的厚无铅铁电薄膜
abstract: Ferroelectric materials are used in applications ranging from energy harvesting to high-power electronic transducers. However, industry-standard ferroelectric materials contain lead, which is toxic and environmentally unfriendly. The preferred alternative, BaTiO3, is non-toxic and has excellent ferroelectric properties, but its Curie temperature of ∼130 °C is too low to be practical. Strain has been used to enhance the Curie temperature of BaTiO3 (ref. ) and SrTiO3 (ref. ) films, but only for thicknesses of tens of nanometres, which is not thick enough for many device applications. Here, we increase the Curie temperature of micrometre-thick films of BaTiO3 to at least 330 °C, and the tetragonal-to-cubic structural transition temperature to beyond 800 °C, by interspersing stiff, self-assembled vertical columns of Sm2O3 throughout the film thickness. The columns, which are 10 nm in diameter, strain the BaTiO3 matrix by 2.35%, forcing it to maintain its tetragonal structure and resulting in the highest BaTiO3 transition temperatures so far.
abstract_cn: 铁电材料用于从能量收集到大功率电子换能器的各种应用。但是，行业标准的铁电材料包含铅，这是有毒的并且对环境不利。优选的替代品BaTiO 3 是无毒的，并且具有优异的铁电性能，但是其居里温度为130℃，太低而无法实用。应变已用于提高BaTiO 3 （ref。＆＃160;）和SrTiO 3 （ref。＆＃160;）薄膜的居里温度，但仅用于厚度为数十纳米，不足以用于许多设备应用。在这里，我们将BaTiO 3 的微米厚膜的居里温度提高到至少330＆＃160;＆＃176; C，并将四方-立方结构的转变温度提高到超过800＆＃160 ;＆＃176; C，通过在整个膜厚度中穿插Sm 2 O 3 的刚性自组装垂直柱。直径为10＆＃160; nm的色谱柱使BaTiO 3 基质变形2.35％，迫使其保持其四方结构，从而得到最高的BaTiO 3 到目前为止的转变温度。

title: Direct laser writing of micro-supercapacitors on hydrated graphite oxide films
title_cn: 在水合氧化石墨膜上直接激光刻写微型超级电容器
abstract: Microscale supercapacitors provide an important complement to batteries in a variety of applications, including portable electronics. Although they can be manufactured using a number of printing and lithography techniques, continued improvements in cost, scalability and form factor are required to realize their full potential. Here, we demonstrate the scalable fabrication of a new type of all-carbon, monolithic supercapacitor by laser reduction and patterning of graphite oxide films. We pattern both in-plane and conventional electrodes consisting of reduced graphite oxide with micrometre resolution, between which graphite oxide serves as a solid electrolyte. The substantial amounts of trapped water in the graphite oxide makes it simultaneously a good ionic conductor and an electrical insulator, allowing it to serve as both an electrolyte and an electrode separator with ion transport characteristics similar to that observed for Nafion membranes. The resulting micro-supercapacitor devices show good cyclic stability, and energy storage capacities comparable to existing thin-film supercapacitors.
abstract_cn: 微型超级电容器在包括便携式电子设备在内的各种应用中为电池提供了重要的补充。尽管可以使用多种印刷和光刻技术来制造它们，但要实现其全部潜能，就需要不断提高成本，可扩展性和外形尺寸。在这里，我们演示了通过激光还原和氧化石墨膜的图案化可大规模制造新型的全碳单片超级电容器。我们对平面电极和常规电极进行了图案化，该电极由具有微米分辨率的还原氧化石墨组成，在这两个电极之间，氧化石墨用作固体电解质。氧化石墨中截留的大量水使其同时成为良好的离子导体和电绝缘体，从而使其既可用作电解质又用作电极隔板，其离子传输特性与Nafion膜相似。最终的微型超级电容器器件具有良好的循环稳定性，储能能力可与现有的薄膜超级电容器媲美。

title: Interfacial phase-change memory
abstract: Phase-change memory technology relies on the electrical and optical properties of certain materials changing substantially when the atomic structure of the material is altered by heating or some other excitation process. For example, switching the composite Ge2Sb2Te5 (GST) alloy from its covalently bonded amorphous phase to its resonantly bonded metastable cubic crystalline phase decreases the resistivity by three orders of magnitude, and also increases reflectivity across the visible spectrum. Moreover, phase-change memory based on GST is scalable, and is therefore a candidate to replace Flash memory for non-volatile data storage applications. The energy needed to switch between the two phases depends on the intrinsic properties of the phase-change material and the device architecture; this energy is usually supplied by laser or electrical pulses. The switching energy for GST can be reduced by limiting the movement of the atoms to a single dimension, thus substantially reducing the entropic losses associated with the phase-change process. In particular, aligning the c-axis of a hexagonal Sb2Te3 layer and the 〈111〉 direction of a cubic GeTe layer in a superlattice structure creates a material in which Ge atoms can switch between octahedral sites and lower-coordination sites at the interface of the superlattice layers. Here we demonstrate GeTe/Sb2Te3 interfacial phase-change memory (IPCM) data storage devices with reduced switching energies, improved write-erase cycle lifetimes and faster switching speeds.
abstract_cn: 相变存储技术依赖于某些材料的电学和光学特性，当材料的原子结构因加热或其他激发过程而改变时，其电学和光学特性会发生实质性变化。例如，将复合Ge 2 Sb 2 Te 5 （GST）合金从其共价键结合的非晶相转变为共振键合的亚稳立方晶体相位将电阻率降低三个数量级，并且还增加了整个可见光谱的反射率。此外，基于GST的相变存储器是可扩展的，因此是替代闪存用于非易失性数据存储应用程序的候选人。在两相之间切换所需的能量取决于相变材料的固有特性和器件架构。这种能量通常由激光或电脉冲提供。通过将原子的运动限制在一个维度上，可以降低GST的转换能量，从而大大减少了与相变过程相关的熵损失。特别是，将六边形Sb 2 Te 3 层和＆＃12296; 111＆＃12297;的c轴对齐。超晶格结构中立方GeTe层的方向会产生一种材料，其中Ge原子可以在超晶格层的界面处的八面体位点和低配位点之间切换。在这里，我们演示了GeTe / Sb 2 Te 3 界面相变存储器（IPCM）数据存储设备，这些设备具有降低的开关能量，改善的写擦除循环寿命和更快的开关速度。

title: Electrically pumped waveguide lasing from ZnO nanowires
title_cn: ZnO纳米线的电泵浦波导激射
abstract: Ultraviolet semiconductor lasers are widely used for applications in photonics, information storage, biology and medical therapeutics. Although the performance of gallium nitride ultraviolet lasers has improved significantly over the past decade, demand for lower costs, higher powers and shorter wavelengths has motivated interest in zinc oxide (ZnO), which has a wide direct bandgap and a large exciton binding energy. ZnO-based random lasing has been demonstrated with both optical and electrical pumping, but random lasers suffer from reduced output powers, unstable emission spectra and beam divergence. Here, we demonstrate electrically pumped Fabry–Perot type waveguide lasing from laser diodes that consist of Sb-doped p-type ZnO nanowires and n-type ZnO thin films. The diodes exhibit highly stable lasing at room temperature, and can be modelled with finite-difference time-domain methods.
abstract_cn: 紫外线半导体激光器广泛用于光子学，信息存储，生物学和医学治疗领域。 尽管氮化镓紫外激光器的性能在过去十年中已得到显着改善，但是对低成本，更高功率和更短波长的需求激发了人们对氧化锌（ZnO）的兴趣，氧化锌具有宽的直接带隙和大的激子结合能。 基于ZnO的随机激射已经在光泵浦和电泵浦中得到了证明，但是随机激光器的输出功率降低，发射光谱不稳定和光束发散，因此受到困扰。 在这里，我们演示了由激光二极管（包括掺Sb的p型ZnO纳米线和n型ZnO薄膜）构成的电泵浦Fabry＆Perot型波导激光。 这些二极管在室温下具有高度稳定的发射激光，并且可以使用时域有限差分法进行建模。

title: Electrically tuned spin–orbit interaction in an InAs self-assembled quantum dot
title_cn: InAs自组装量子点中的电调谐自旋轨道相互作用
abstract: Electrical control over electron spin is a prerequisite for spintronics spin-based quantum information processing. In particular, control over the interaction between the orbital motion and the spin state of electrons would be valuable, because this interaction influences spin relaxation and dephasing. Electric fields have been used to tune the strength of the spin–orbit interaction in two-dimensional electron gases, but not, so far, in quantum dots. Here, we demonstrate that electrical gating can be used to vary the energy of the spin–orbit interaction in the range 50–150 µeV while maintaining the electron occupation of a single self-assembled InAs quantum dot. We determine the spin–orbit interaction energy by observing the splitting of Kondo effect features at high magnetic fields.
abstract_cn: 对电子自旋的电子控制是基于自旋电子自旋的量子信息处理的先决条件。 特别地，控制轨道运动和电子的自旋态之间的相互作用将很有价值，因为这种相互作用会影响自旋弛豫和移相。 电场已被用来调整二维电子气中自旋轨道相互作用的强度，但到目前为止尚未调整量子点中的自旋轨道相互作用的强度。 在这里，我们证明了电子门控可用于在50e.eV范围内改变自旋轨道相互作用的能量，同时保持单个自组装InAs的电子占有率 量子点。 通过观察强磁场下近藤效应特征的分裂，确定自旋轨道相互作用能。

title: Long-range electron tunnelling in oligo-porphyrin molecular wires
title_cn: 低聚卟啉分子线中的远程电子隧穿
abstract: Short chains of porphyrin molecules can mediate electron transport over distances as long as 5–10 nm with low attenuation. This means that porphyrin-based molecular wires could be useful in nanoelectronic and photovoltaic devices, but the mechanisms responsible for charge transport in single oligo-porphyrin wires have not yet been established. Here, based on electrical measurements of single-molecule junctions, we show that the conductance of the oligo-porphyrin wires has a strong dependence on temperature, and a weak dependence on the length of the wire. Although it is widely accepted that such behaviour is a signature of a thermally assisted incoherent (hopping) mechanism, density functional theory calculations and an accompanying analytical model strongly suggest that the observed temperature and length dependence is consistent with phase-coherent tunnelling through the whole molecular junction.
abstract_cn: 卟啉分子的短链可以介导长至5 10 10 nm的距离上的电子传输，且衰减低。 这意味着基于卟啉的分子线可能在纳米电子和光伏设备中有用，但是尚未确定负责单个寡卟啉线中电荷传输的机制。 在这里，基于单分子结的电学测量，我们表明寡聚卟啉导线的电导率对温度的依赖性强，而对导线长度的依赖性则弱。 尽管人们普遍认为这种行为是热辅助非相干（跳跃）机制的标志，但密度泛函理论计算和随附的分析模型强烈表明，观察到的温度和长度依赖性与贯穿整个分子的相干隧穿一致 结。</ p>

title: Cell-surface sensors for real-time probing of cellular environments
title_cn: 细胞表面传感器，用于实时探测细胞环境
abstract: The ability to explore cell signalling and cell-to-cell communication is essential for understanding cell biology and developing effective therapeutics. However, it is not yet possible to monitor the interaction of cells with their environments in real time. Here, we show that a fluorescent sensor attached to a cell membrane can detect signalling molecules in the cellular environment. The sensor is an aptamer (a short length of single-stranded DNA) that binds to platelet-derived growth factor (PDGF) and contains a pair of fluorescent dyes. When bound to PDGF, the aptamer changes conformation and the dyes come closer to each other, producing a signal. The sensor, which is covalently attached to the membranes of mesenchymal stem cells, can quantitatively detect with high spatial and temporal resolution PDGF that is added in cell culture medium or secreted by neighbouring cells. The engineered stem cells retain their ability to find their way to the bone marrow and can be monitored in vivo at the single-cell level using intravital microscopy.
abstract_cn: 探索细胞信号传导和细胞间通讯的能力对于理解细胞生物学和开发有效的疗法至关重要。但是，尚不可能实时监视细胞与其环境的相互作用。在这里，我们表明附着在细胞膜上的荧光传感器可以检测细胞环境中的信号分子。该传感器是一种适体（短长度的单链DNA），可与血小板衍生的生长因子（PDGF）结合并包含一对荧光染料。当与PDGF结合时，适体会改变构象，并且染料彼此靠近，从而产生信号。该传感器共价附于间充质干细胞的膜上，可以定量检测具有高时空分辨率的PDGF，该PDGF添加到细胞培养基中或由邻近细胞分泌。经过工程改造的干细胞保留了找到骨髓的能力，并且可以使用活体显微镜在体内对单细胞水平进行监测。
